definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
surname Shao/name of an ancient state that existed in what is now Shaanxi Province
to call together/to summon/to convene/temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)

sentences.english: This is the day of salvation, calling sinners to repent and believe the gospel.
sentences.chinese: 这是拯救的时代，呼召罪人悔改，相信福音。

sentences.english: If you aren't called to go, then choose to be a sender.
sentences.chinese: 若你没有被呼召出去，选择作为一个差派者。

sentences.english: How do we celebrate Christmas in ways worthy of the calling of being Christians?
sentences.chinese: 我们要如何与所蒙作基督徒的呼召相称地庆祝圣诞？

sentences.english: Our calling, is to worship, honor and serve God.
sentences.chinese: 我们所受的呼召，乃是去敬拜尊荣，事奉神。

sentences.english: This selection and destiny are of the very God who calls, not of those who work.
sentences.chinese: 这拣选和定命乃是在于呼召的神，不在于作工的人。

sentences.english: And those He calls, He also enable and equips by His strength, power, and might.
sentences.chinese: 而祂所呼召的人，祂也会以祂的大能大力来装备他们。

sentences.english: Certainly, if this is when God calls you, we have to obey.
sentences.chinese: 若你真是在这时候才受到神的呼召，那我们当顺服。

sentences.english: Jesus also ended up with Simon Peter.
sentences.chinese: 之后耶稣也呼召西门彼得。

sentences.english: Has God called you to a special task or any type of service for him?
sentences.chinese: 神是否呼召你去作一项特殊的任务或某项事奉呢？

sentences.english: Jesus calls us not only to come to him, but to go for him.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣不单呼召我们归向他，更要去传他。

sentences.english: Must clearly sense the calling of God to the ministry.
sentences.chinese: 必须清楚神对他全职事奉的呼召。

sentences.english: When God calls, we are to give the best time of our life to Him.
sentences.chinese: 当神呼召我们，我们当把一生的黄金岁月献给祂。

sentences.english: When Jesus calls you, he expects you to begin thinking like him.
sentences.chinese: 当耶稣呼召你时，他希望你开始像他一样思考。

sentences.english: So, the call to follow is also a call to suffer for his name.
sentences.chinese: 所以，跟随的呼召也就是为他的名而受苦的呼召。

sentences.english: So, the call to follow is also a call to suffer for his name.
sentences.chinese: 所以，跟随的呼召也就是为他的名而受苦的呼召。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
